name: Onkar Singh
text: I’ve given them so many chances to get my orders right, but it always seems to be wrong, and today was the final straw. After having to drive all the way back to to return a pizza that was messed up, I was made to feel as if I was trying to …More

name: Jack Gebert
text: Great job tonight. Manager was extremely nice with my pizza not being cooked the way I wanted it to be. Gave me a credit for next time and was very understanding and to the point. Great manager must meant they have great workers. Good job guys!

name: Dave Runde
text: They were very busy. They took good care of me.

name: Natasha Johal
text: Horrible place! The staff is so rude, they argue with YOU when THEY mess up your order! Terrible service, I am suprised they are still in business.

name: Kylie Marie
text: I ordered a pizza a drink and garlic knots only received the pizza she almost forgot the pop but reminded her and she grabbed it out of her car but never received my garlic knots (which she also forgot in her car) called her and she said …More

name: Charles Moe
text: Delivery guy was polite, but the food wasn’t very warm or fully cooked, and it smelled musty somehow. Maybe I just don’t like Pizza Hut anymore.

name: Joshua Christian
text: Very good pizza and breadsticks. I have had some not great experiences with this store in the past but last night they did a great job. I ordered online and got my food within a half hour. Everything was correct, food was hot, delivery driver was pleasant. Good job.

name: mike johnson
text: Multiple times. Ordered food online. Had to wait. In-store longer than an hour. Never again coming here.

name: Rachael Seelhoff
text: Excellent staff, hard working and very kind! I sat in the waiting area for my take out order and was so impressed by the teamwork of this staff and how they handled a very demanding supper hour.

name: Carley Anderson Chouinard
text: Very friendly staff at this location. They are always helpful with their promotions and get you the best deal. They work quickly to get your order ready and are always accurate.

name: J P
text: Quick grab and go pizza hut. No room for dining. Delivery and pick up only. Every order we have had has been accurate, fresh, and hot.

name: Amanda K
text: Every time I've ordered there food is not cooked thoroughly or it takes forever to receive the food. By the time you get it the food is cold and mushy. Not to mention their prices.

name: Andrew Kramer
text: Terrible pizza everytime we tried it.  Always undercooked and late on delivery.

name: Maria Fitzgerald
text: Their food might taste good but, it's horribly greesey.

name: chris shelton
text: I'm staying in a hotel in Rogers MN, which according to google is 5.1 miles from this Pizza Hut.  I called in a order and talked to a lady and she took my order and my card info and delivery location info and told me my pizza would arrive …More

name: wb severin
text: Saint Michael Pizza Hut is having a rough night but they are trying to take care of their customers. Good job on them !!!

name: Wyatt Munson
text: Awful, just awful. I don't know how they managed to fail so horribly at their job but they did. It took almost an hour to arrive and when I finally got my pizza it was crushed and cold. Out of all the pizza places in town, this place sits …More

text: About what you would expect from a strip mall Pizza Hut. Slow and dirty. Their computers never seem to be working correctly. Food was just OK.

name: Matt Fuchs
text: Had the best experience ever tonight with this store.  Pizzas were cooked perfectly, and the delivery driver Matt was awesome.  I've had a couple bad experiences in the past but this order changed my mind and I will be ordering again soon.

name: Zach Meyer
text: Emma... please go back to work. You’re employee Kayla is giving all your business to dominos.

text: The driver was very rude to our sitter, I called the store and the guy said he talked to the driver and the driver said he wasn't rude then hung up on me!

text: I ordered two pan pizzas one was correct and one was incorrect. I contacted store through email a week ago. I still have not recieved a response.

text: Absolutely the worst Pizza Hut experience I've ever had. Ordered with the app, then waited for the delivery that never came. When I tried to call the location I got a call center instead. Ended up getting in touch with the store manager …More

name: Ed Cat
text: Ordered on line and it was ready when I got there. Great Pizza - they didn't skimp on the toppings~!  The staff is very friendly, knew what they were doing and did it quickly.  I will be back soon. . .

name: Tiara Mathiason
text: You guys are great! Keep it up!

name: Kasey Kadlec
text: We ordered four pizzas around 10:30pm tonight. We were told there was a 30-45min delivery time. It's currently 12:30am and we have not received our pizzas. My debit card was charged for the pizzas & the payment was reversed at 11:30pm. We …More

name: Grant
text: Best pizza there is. I think most people that order pizza here dont even think about writing a good review because it was pizza but if you order pizza and its bad it gives you a reason to write a review, I have never had a problem with pizza hut, would recommend.

name: Dakota Housman
text: Ordered double Canadian bacon, got double sausage. Ordered sweet tea, got unsweet tea in a milk jug. Pizza was good though.

name: Dee Dee Lind
text: Ok they need to figure something out with the phone number that is on the St. Michael Pizza Hut website.  I called & asked if they delivered & was told yes.  I said the website said u aren't open til 4, do u deliver now (11am) I was told …More

name: David Beck
text: Ordered on a slow night, didn't receive order for over an hour and a half. Everything was cold. Tried to call, but was hung up on and stuck being transferred by the "call center " for over 20 minutes.  Never got ahold of anyone actually at the store. Do not order from this location.

name: Andrea Huberty
text: Quick carry out service, pizza came with wrong crust but still delicious.

name: Gabe Borscheid
text: Glad to have a pizza hut nearby

name: Nellie Bacigalupo
text: Horrible!    Just wanted to get a gluten free pizza delivered to my daughter in albertville where she works.   The lady on the phone says she can't find the address.   Too bad this place can't be local in a small town.   Will never order from them again!

name: Jamie Smith
text: I recently had one of the absolute worst customer service experiences in my life with this place.  We ordered a Pizza online.  Once you complete the order it says if you need to change or cancel anything call this number, and it gives you …More

name: Brandon Anderson
text: Order has been correct both times from them. My online order was ready for pickup before they said it would be ready.

name: Roman Robison
text: Don't come here it is the worst Pizza Hut in MN, be careful Pirate Man will get you.

name: Sean Roen
text: Raw pizza even asking to cook longer.

name: Lindsay Lumley
text: Have never in almost 2 years had good service with this location.  It is very unfortunate that being a small town that we have to deal with a Pizza Hut like this.

name: Mike Roberts
text: Over an hour.  Still waiting. Ok 90 minutes and I am 3 minutes from store! The last time I ordered it took less than 5 min? Now you have to order  talking to a person not at that store....they charged 1.00 for marinara, which used to be complementary. Too bad. I like their pizza. I won't be waiting up past midnight for that again.

name: Tracy H
text: Very unprofessional behavior by employees, very rude, they should be fired.  Every time, I've gone in there, they've been very unwelcoming. It's a a very awful thing to alienate the community that supports your business. I'll never go there again.

name: MW B
text: Great specials, nice helpful staff.

name: Mark Freeman
text: Waited ninety minutes for our order only discover it wasn't coming. How can they stay in business  with their disregard for any kind of customer service? Try anywhere else.
